mapper.select: SELECT play_info.play_no, play_info.play_title, play_info.genre, play_info.rated, play_schedule.runtime FROM play_info INNER JOIN play_schedule ON play_info.play_title=play_schedule.play_title
SELECT play_info.play_no, play_info.play_title, play_info.genre, play_info.rated, play_schedule.runtime FROM play_info INNER JOIN play_schedule ON play_info.play_title=play_schedule.play_title
